description: portrait of a man seated in a dark upholstered, high-backed chair, leaning toward PR; man has white hair and thick moustache and wears dark tie; PR hand resting on table in front of man's chest, holding cigarette
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

on back, in pencil: [(illegible) 2/1]; see Signed
provenance: [Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, until 1985; sold in December with second state for NTO to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1985-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LLC below image, in pencil: [Edgar Chahine - epreuve avant la lettre]; LRC below image, in pencil: [\"Portrait d\'Alfred Stevens\"]
title: Portrait of Alfred Stevens
